alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 02 at 2:16AM MDT until November 02 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds with occasional gusts of 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Livingston Area. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Strong winds won`t be continuous this morning, but will come and go. Sudden strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The threat of strong winds will diminish with a cold frontal passage late this morning.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Secure outdoor objects.
